ch.ethz.inspire.emod.simulation

Class SimulationState

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.inspire.emod.simulation.SimulationState

  • public class SimulationState
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the machine state of a simulation. A list of times and machine states are read from a file and stored in a list. For a given time the corresponding machine state can be asked for. And the end of the simulation is determined.

    File format of the input list:
    Duration1 , State1 ;
    Duration2 , State2 ;
    The duration corresponds to the duration of the state in s.
    The sum of all durations is the length of the simulation.
    A comment line begins with '#'.

    Author:
    andreas

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        public MachineState getState(double time)
        Get state at actual time. Note: Calling this method multiple times, the time parameter must be increasing. The previous machine state cannot be restored.
        Parameters:
        time - Time for the desired sate.
        Returns:
        The machine state at time 'time'.

      • readSimulationStatesFromFile

        private void readSimulationStatesFromFile(java.lang.String file)
        reads machine states from file.

        syntax: time[s],SimulationState;time[s],SimulationState;...;
        Comment lines begin with '#'.
        Spaces are allowed.

        Parameters:
